remarks: The Law of Quadratic Reciprocity.  If ` P ` and ` Q ` are distinct odd primes, then the product of the Legendre symbols ` ( P /L Q ) ` and ` ( Q /L P ) ` is the parity of ` ( ( P - 1 ) / 2 ) x. ( ( Q - 1 ) / 2 ) ` .  This uses Eisenstein's proof, which also has a nice geometric interpretation - see ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proofs_of_quadratic_reciprocity .  This is Metamath 100 proof #7.
